holidays.title: National Mom and Pop Business Owners Day
Commemoration Of Boganda
holidays.description: Get ready to commemorate this special day in the Central African Republic!

holidays.title: Earth Hour
holidays.description: We are a step closer to protecting our planet, and it starts with you switching off your lights for an hour.

holidays.title: Knights Of Columbus Founder's Day
holidays.description: On this day, mark your calendar to celebrate the Knights of Columbus Founders Day!

holidays.title: Knights of Columbus Founders Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn more about the Knights of Columbus and the incredible work they do.

holidays.title: Martyrs’ Day Madagascar
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Madagascar’s freedom as well as memorialize the fallen.

holidays.title: Mermaid Day
holidays.description: Gear up and celebrate the most famous mythic creature from under the sea.

holidays.title: National Lemon Chiffon Cake Day
holidays.description: There's just enough cake to go around, so take a piece and enjoy.

holidays.title: National Smoke and Mirrors Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the art of magical illusions and to be wary of deceptive practices in daily life.

holidays.title: National Vietnam War Veterans Day
holidays.description: We commemorate and honor all the men and women who fought during the Vietnam War.

holidays.title: New Moon March
holidays.description: We love this day and all its cool information — to the Moon and back!

holidays.title: Niagara Falls Runs Dry Day
holidays.description: Let's prepare to observe and learn about the day Niagara Falls stopped flowing!

holidays.title: Payday It Forward
holidays.description: Today you get to show your appreciation to the young black boys and men you know.

holidays.title: Texas Loves the Children Day
holidays.description: Get informed with our detailed article about child abuse and neglect on this day.

holidays.title: Vietnam Veterans Day
holidays.description: Honor the nine million Americans who fought in the Vietnam War on Vietnam Veterans Day.

holidays.title: World Piano Day
holidays.description: Get your favorite sheet music out as we celebrate the king of musical instruments.

holidays.title: CJ So Cool’s Birthday
holidays.description: C.J. So Cool is on a mission to be what he was destined to be.

holidays.title: Irene’s Birthday
holidays.description: Is there anything this entertainment phenomenon can’t do? Joo-Hyun is just getting started.

holidays.title: Jack Wright’s Birthday
holidays.description: We want to see the creative journey the internet sensation Jack Wright is undergoing!

holidays.title: Mark Thomas’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s no stopping this young internet star as he continues to shine bright!

holidays.title: Sulli’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sulli proved in her brief life that you can achieve and work toward your heart's desires.
